title: Voz do Povo (A)
body: This weekly, of which José Marciano da Silveira was the editor, published its first issue on May 17, 1860, and ended with issue number 1344 on October 15, 1877. In 1911, another newspaper with the same name appeared, which published 59 issues, the first on October 1 and the last on December 10.
